ist ein scheiß game 0/10 würde wieder spielen

The shooter series that defined the Fps genre and Fps competitions. Such a simple game and such a simple design, packs a full shooter experience and requires a full team cooperation to come out on top. Most players in CS are really good and you can find yourself easily outgunned and outskilled. The shooting mechanics are unique to CS and do not play like your typical BF or CoD. This game is free and you get tons and tons of hours of playtime and achievements to work for which you really can’t complain about! There are also updates that get pushed out to keep the game fresh. Lastly, there are some hacks that people ‘use’ sometimes in matches, which is really disappointing, but the community actually actively tries to kick these players or someone from the opposite team “enables” their hacks and trolls the other player until they leave or turn them off.

The simplicity of this game is the key that'll make the game last for decades with constant updates!

Even after playing this game for countless hours, getting back only toxic, straight up idiotic feedback from the teammates, this game still shines in the FPS pile by the straightforward approach to the FPS formula. It's basic and reliable and that's why I'm always gonna come back to it.
